txt.en: 'The Orcs are fleeing! Still, there are many of the Enemy that stand their ground. We must now see this battle through! I shall meet you at Minas Tirith when the fighting here has waned.'
Speak with Bregdal at the Threshold of the City

'Many have been slain this day but we fought valiantly. No life lost was in vain.\n\n'Now the task begins to prepare for what is to come next. The fires of Mount Doom still glow from behind of the mountains of Mordor. What the Dark Lord has planned, I do not know, but I can say for certain that we must do all within our power to stop his plans.'
Bregdal can be found at the Threshold of the City.\n\nYou should speak with Bregdal.
In the thick of battle upon the fields of Pelennor, Bregdal, Errand-rider of Gondor, hopes to assist you in any way he can.
